original: Löfstedt, Frithiof, leg. veterinär, klinikchef, bataljonsveterinär v. Fvk, Skara, f. 8/10/06 i Lund av kantor Jonas o. Elna L. G. 38 m. Harriet Al-lerfeldt. — Stud:ex. v. Lunds kate-dralsk. 26, veter:ex. 41. Vik:förordn. som tf. distr :veter. 35-38, assist, h. distr:veter. G. Danelius i Linköp. 37- 39, militärtj. 40, assist, v. veter rhögsk. medic. o. kir. klin. 41-46, klinikchef v. veter linrättn. i Skara S’ed. 46. Batal-jonsveter. v. Fvk sed. 43. Medl. av Sällsk. f. veter :medic. forskn. sed. 43. Skr.: Behandl. av inälvsparasiter h. häst (38), Enchondrcsis interverte-bralis (41), Valpsjuka h. hund (41), Otitis externa h. hund (41), Om K-vitamin o. protrombin (42), Banga-bortmetastas-er i bursor, senskidor o. leder h. häst o. nötkreatur (45), Sänkningsreaktionen, leukocyträkning o. formoi-gelreaktionen v. kir. lidanden h. häst o. hund (45), Allergi o. allerg. senskide-, ’sen- o. ledlidanden h. häst o. hund (45), Vätskebalansen v. kir. lidanden m. spec. hänsyn t. serumpro-teinhalten (45). Hobbies: musik, målning, fiske o. jakt.
translated:
Löfstedt, Frithiof, Licensed Veterinarian, Clinic Manager, Battalion Veterinarian at the Military Air Base in Skara, born on October 8, 1906 in Lund, son of Cantor Jonas and Elna L. G. Married to Harriet Allerfeldt in 1938. 

Education: Graduated from Lunds katedralskola in 1926, obtained veterinary degree in 1941. Temporary District Veterinarian from 1935-1938, assistant to District Veterinarian G. Danelius in Linköping from 1937-1939, military service in 1940. Worked as assistant at Veterinary University Hospital's Medical and Surgical Clinic from 1941-1946, became clinic manager at the Veterinary Training Center in Skara in 1946. Battalion Veterinarian at the Military Air Base since 1943. Member of the Society for Veterinary Medical Research since 1943.

Publications: Treatment of internal parasites in horses (1938), Intervertebral enchondrosis (1941), Distemper in dogs (1941), External otitis in dogs (1941), K-vitamin and prothrombin (1942), Removal of metastases in bursas, tendons, and joints in horses and cattle (1945), Erythrocyte sedimentation rate, leukocyte count and phagocytosis reaction in surgical diseases of horses and dogs (1945), Allergy and allergic diseases in tendons, ligaments, and joints of horses and dogs (1945), Fluid balance in surgical diseases with special consideration for serum protein content (1945).

Hobbies: Music, painting, fishing, and hunting.

publications.name: Treatment of internal parasites in horses
Removal of metastases in bursas, tendons, and joints in horses and cattle
Erythrocyte sedimentation rate, leukocyte count and phagocytosis reaction in surgical diseases of horses and dogs
Allergy and allergic diseases in tendons, ligaments, and joints of horses and dogs
Fluid balance in surgical diseases with special consideration for serum protein content
